structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
The Land Court And Registration Of Title To Land

law.text: Upon original registration, there shall be paid to the recorder one tenth of one per cent of the assessed value of the land, on the basis of the last assessment for municipal taxation, or, in case of the registration of an easement or right, one tenth of one per cent of the value thereof as found by the court, as an assurance fund.
